name: COVID-19 Cases per Country
content:
Description: live dataset, updated weekly, on confirmed cases of COVID-19 per country worldwide

Source: [DataHub](https://datahub.io/core/covid-19#data)  
 
Columns

* Date (string): the recorded date associated with new COVID-19 cases for that country
* State (string): what country recorded new COVID-19 cases
* Confirmed New Cases (numerical): how many new confirmed cases were recorded in that country for that day
* Recovered (numerical): how many previously confirmed COVID-19 patients fully recovered from the virus, per the stated day in that country
* Deaths (numerical)): how many deaths caused by COVID-19 occurred in that country for the day
